pages.title: Broken
pages.text: $(br)Thanks to your magical blessing, when your equipment breaks, it won't shatter â€” it turns into a $(key)Broken Item$() instead. You can fully repair it with a certain amount of $(mage/essence#mend)Mending Essence$().

pages.title: Hardened
pages.text: $(br)Usually, the more damage a mob deals to you, the more durability damage it deals to your armor. The $(key)Hardened$() enchantment caps durability loss per hit to at most $(bold)1$().

pages.title: Durable Armor
pages.text: $(br)The $(key)Durable Armor$() enchantment increases your armor's durability. It is incompatible with $(key)Unbreaking$().$(br2)$(bold)$(#f00)Note: for some reason, this enchantment is currently not working!$()

pages.title: Safeguard
pages.text: $(br)The $(key)Safeguard$() enchantment ensures that when an item with durability greater than $(bold)1$() takes durability damage, its durability will not drop below $(bold)1$(). If the durability is not restored after some time, the enchantment will be $(bold)removed$().
